turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there, I'd like to make an order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What location are you trying to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Mankato, Minnesota.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. Fantastic. What can we do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to make an order for two large pizzas

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. Is this for pick up or delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pick up please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, what would you like on the first pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like just pineapple and ham on the first one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Pineapple and Ham? OK, got it. What crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll just take the regular crust please, for both.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. And what would you like on the second one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just plain cheese on that one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, and that one is on our traditional crust too, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that everything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you interested in any of our sides or dipping sauces?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'm fine, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, so just to confirm you want 2 large pizzas, traditional crust, one plain cheese and one with pineapple and ham?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. So your total is going to be $21.02 after tax

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How would you like to pay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll pay via my Pizza account that's linked to my phone

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you calling from the same number as linked to your account?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. We'll send the receipt to your mobile device via text message

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, your order will be available for pickup in about 25 minutes. We'll see you then!
